description: Answering the question you didn't think to ask, Rack and Slay has shown up to show you what happens when you combine a dungeon crawler with something resembling billiards and pool. It's as odd as it sounds but it works.
title: Rack and Slay answers the question of "what if a dungeon crawler was like billiards"

description: CONSCRIPT from Jordan Mochi/ Catchweight Studio and publisher Team17 is a promising looking first world war survival-horror that was crowdfunded back in 2020. Now the developer has cancelled the planned Linux and macOS versions.
title: Dev of crowdfunded WW1 survival-horror game CONSCRIPT cancels Linux and macOS versions

description: Framework, the popular maker of customizable, modular and upgradable laptops has announced a big upgrade for the Framework Laptop 13 across both Intel and AMD models.
title: Framework Laptop 13 gets Intel Core Ultra with a 120 Hz display, and cheaper AMD models

description: Minami Lane from Doot / Blibloop released with Native Linux support back in February, and the developer just released a major update adding in controller support.
title: Super-chilled management game Minami Lane adds full controller support

description: Entering Early Access on Steam back in March, Athena Crisis clearly takes inspiration from the classic Advanced Wars and now the code has been made open source.
title: Athena Crisis looks a lot like Advanced Wars and now its code is open source

description: Never a dull day on Steam, with there now being a game where all you do is just click a picture of a Banana. Yes, that's it and over 30,000 people are playing it right now.
title: Over 30,000 people are clicking a picture of a Banana on Steam

description: Valve fans sure are passionate and they're once again trying to get Valve's attention to sort out various problems in Team Fortress 2.
title: Team Fortress 2 fans have launched a new campaign to get Valve to save it

description: Recently it was pretty big news that Nintendo issued takedowns to Facepunch for Garry's Mod content, and now Garry Newman of Facepunch has written up a blog post with some comments on it.
title: Garry Newman of Facepunch comments on the Nintendo takedown of Garry's Mod content
